description: Text to Speech extension allows you to use over 60+ voices along with different settings such as controlling the volume, rate and pitch of the voice.
name: TextToSpeech
shortDescription: An Extension to enable the use of Text to Speech features.

eventsFunctions.name: Speak
eventsFunctions.sentence: Speak  _PARAM1_, with voice _PARAM2_., volume _PARAM3_, rate _PARAM4_, pitch _PARAM5_

parameters.description: Enter the voice you want to speak
parameters.name: Voice

parameters.description: Sets the Volume the message is spoken between 0 and 1. (default = 1)
parameters.name: Volume

parameters.description: Sets the Speed the message is spoken between 0.1 and 10. (default = 1)
parameters.name: Rate

parameters.description: Sets the Pitch the message is spoken between 0 and 2. (default = 1)
parameters.name: Pitch
